title: Implement hypothetical future network visualization
description: Create a second HTML visualization showing a hypothetical future state where isolated clusters become connected through 2 intermediary organizations. Includes ~50 grey hypothetical edges, visual indicators (banner, watermark), and maintains exact positions of existing 78 nodes.
close_reason: Successfully implemented hypothetical future network visualization with 2 intermediary hubs connecting all 46 isolated organizations. Includes visual indicators (banner, watermark, grey edges), documentation, and automated build pipeline.
